name: explorer-kit
effect: Sends the trainer to the Underground. Only usable outside.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground in the Sinnoh region.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground in the Sinnoh region.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground in the Sinnoh region.
